title: Learn not to burn
creator_credit: John Marsh, Dick Johnson and Tatham-Laird and Kudner
brief_description: Shows some common fire hazards around the house, including smoking in bed, the kitchen stove and improper wiring. Illustrates proper emergency escape procedures and shows what to do when one’s clothes catch on fire. Features Dick Van Dyke.
creator_credit_for_label: John Marsh, Dick Johnson and Tatham-Laird and Kudner
